params.customFieldsRules: custom_preconds: Write preconditions as plain text (e.g. 'User has a valid account. App is installed.'). custom_steps_json: Write test steps as a JSON array where each object has 'content' (the action to perform) and 'expected' (the expected result for that step). Example: [{"content":"Open the app and navigate to Sign-in screen","expected":"Sign-in screen is displayed with header 'Sign in.'"}]
